item.title: Cool and quiet benchmarking on MACCHIATObin (Armada 8040)
item.description: I've recently taken delivery of a few new goodies to complement the MACCHIATObin Arm v8 powered board that I've written about recently on my blog.

item.title: Turning up the heat...on my Armada 8040
item.description: Although I took delivery of a shiny new SolidRun Marvell macchiatoBIN a few months back (end May), I've not really had a chance to put it through it's paces until now.
